#Make Figure 2a
##You have to include state=identity when working with excel files
#THE COLUMNS IT IS PULLING DATA FROM ARE JUST PLACE HOLDER
```{r}
fig_two_a <- (ggplot(data=raw_data, aes(raw_data[[1]], raw_data[[5]])) +
  geom_bar(stat='identity')+
  labs(x = "Altitude", y = "Log10 DMC Count") +
  ggtitle("Figure 2a") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)))

print(fig_two_a)
pdf("Plots/fig_two_a.pdf")
```
